skills.name: Universal Blueprint
skills.description:
Charged cannon.
1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.
Wielder deals 35% more Ice DMG.

skills.name: Logical Construct
skills.description:
[SP: 5][CD: 25s] Unleash a constructor weapon ATK that deals 500.0%+9*85.0+300% ATK of Ice DMG. Final hit freezes enemies for 5s and inflicts 10 Rime Trauma. After use, wielder ATKs gain 35% Total DMG Multiplier for 7s.
Herrscher of Reason equip bonus: Active skill inflicts 7s Analyzed debuff on enemies. Casting the Ultimate gives 5 SP.
